name: Sibhatullah Faruqi
story: Kabir Takhtar grew up in a small village outside of Tehran. He was recruited by the Iranian military at a young age and trained as a marksman. After a successful military career, Kabir was approached by the OPFOR faction and offered a position as an autorifleman. Despite his reservations, Kabir took the job in order to provide for his aging mother, who still lives in their village.
